entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:21 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -38.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -38.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -42.4°C
Wind: SSE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 35. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 39. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 29. POP 30%
